page.topic: Deprecated and Obsolete Features introduced in Alpha Anywhere 4.3
page.description: Google has deprecated some of their mapping functionality. In response, some mapping features have been removed from Alpha Anywhere and are no longer available.

discussion.p: *[Google Maps]* - Map overview and Pan control properties have been removed from Alpha Anywhere as Google has deprecated these features. For more information, *[extlink:click here@https://developers.google.com/maps/articles/v322-controls-diff]*.
